org.aksw.iguana.utils

Class EmailHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aksw.iguana.utils.EmailHandler

  • public class EmailHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides an easy to use interface to send emails if the Benchmark succeeded or aborted with the option to attach the results
    Author:
    Felix Conrads
